sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-overlay', templateUrl: './create-overlay.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-overlay.component.scss'] }) export class CreateOverlayComponent { showOverlay: boolean = false; closeOverlay(e:any){ if(e == 'force-close'){ this.showOverlay = false; return } if(this.showOverlay){ if(e.srcElement.className == 'overlay'){ this.showOverlay = false; } } } }
